postsData.title: Create a Table of Contents for a Next.js Markdown Blog
postsData.description: Build an auto-generated table of contents, which can highlight its items based on the current scrolling position

postsData.title: Deploy static Next.js websites on GitHub Pages

postsData.author: mirbostani
